messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2749
messages.msgSnippet: On Wednesday, December 18, 2002, at 11:12 PM, ... Please DO discuss unschooling and just ignore attitudes that you don t like. Critiquing other people s
messages.messageBody:
On Wednesday, December 18, 2002, at 11:12 PM,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Notice that I was not even discussing unschooling, just questioning
> certain attitudes.

Please DO discuss unschooling and just ignore attitudes that you don't
like. Critiquing other people's "attitudes" on email lists always
disrupts list discussion and does not contribute to better discussion
of topics relevant to the list purpose. If you feel you must teach
others here to be more gentle or anything else, how about doing it by
example - just post about unschooling in ways you wish others would
post and trust people to learn.


--pam
